name: raspberrypi-rotary-encoder
description: Reliable monitoring of rotary encoders from a raspberry pi

scripts.preinstall: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install python3-pip -y && sudo pip install wiringpi && cd && git clone https://github.com/WiringPi/WiringPi && git clone https://github.com/doceme/py-spidev.git && git clone https://github.com/guyc/py-gaugette.git && cd WiringPi && sudo bash build && cd && sudo rm -rf WiringPi && cd py-spidev && sudo python setup.py install && cd && sudo rm -rf py-spidev && cd py-gaugette && sudo python setup.py install && cd && sudo rm -rf py-gaugette

author: kevincastejon
